pages.text: This rocket will end the rain when it explodes in the sky.$(br2)The more Sponges are added to the Anti Rain Rocket the longer it will stay clear.$(br2)Every inserted Sponge will spawn as Wet Sponge when the rocket explodes.$(br2)Dispensers can be used to automate this rocket.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Craft one $(l:firework_rocket)Firework Rocket$(/l) along with Sponges (dry) to get an Anti Rain Rocket.$(br2)You can also use an existing Anti Rain Rocket and add more Sponges to it.$(br2)The recipe is shapeless.
